name: Twilights Call Original
description:
Twilights Call is a prototype I wiped up  in 2017.

There are no animations or sound effects. I plan on making a full game with a project of the same name but for the most part this prototype has been scrapped.So I felt I might as well throw out my old college work to the world. If you are curious of the "New" Twilights call check out my portfolio 

http://www.kyle-johnson.ca/portfolio.html#nova
